headline.print_headline: In Campaign and Company, Daughter Has a Central Role
headline.main: In Campaign and Company, Ivanka Trump Has a Central Role

lead_paragraph: Ms. Trump holds an exalted position in the family, in their company and even in her father’s campaign.
snippet: Ms. Trump holds an exalted position in the family, in their company and even in her father’s campaign....
abstract: Ivanka Trump, Donald J Trump's oldest daughter and central fixture of both his personal and professional lives, has come to be one of his most valuable political allies on campaign trail; Ivanka's carefully crafted reserve stands in opposition to Trump's bellicosity, while her presence helps counter sexist charges lobbed against Trump.

byline.contributor: Jacob Bernstein contributed reporting. Kitty Bennett contributed research.
